#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll t,i,l1,l,f1;
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		f1=0;
		char s[50001],s1[50001];
		cin>>s>>s1;
		for(l=0;s[l]!='\0';l++);
		for(l1=0;s1[l1]!='\0';l1++);
		if(l==l1)
		{
			sort(s,s+l);sort(s1,s1+l);
			f(i,l)
			{
				if(s[i]!=s1[i])
				{
					f1=1;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(f1)
			cout<<"NO\n";
			else
			cout<<"YES\n";
		}
		else
		cout<<"NO\n";
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
